title: Keeping Fiona: Possessive Alpha Romance (She's Mine! Book 1)
features: She wanted to dance with the devil,But she only wanted to do it once.Well, that's too bad.One night with her left me addicted.
There's just one problem.She's sitting in the front row of my classroom,And she's my student.
Nobody is going to believe all of this started before either of us knew that.
But what they don't know won't hurt them, right?I won't let her go. I'm keeping Fiona.She's mine!
description: The pages will have you dripping in yummy panty-melting chemistry that will have you nice and uncomfortable in your seat craving more! -Treasa
The spend the night together and he is hooked.  She feels the same way.  Emotional, exciting, hot and so much more! -Sherry
I loved this book.  It will draw you in and not let you go. -Michelle
